text:
Muhammad Fuad Masum ("Muḥammad Fūād Ma‘ṣūm"; Kurdish:, born 1 January 1938) was the seventh President of Iraq from 24 July 2014 through 2 October 2019.
Masum is a veteran Iraqi Kurdish politician and was elected as President following the 2014 parliamentary election.
Masum is the second non-Arab president of Iraq, replacing Jalal Talabani, also Kurdish, and is a friend of Talabani.
